forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. North wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 50. North wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
As the afternoon sun bathes Downtown San Francisco in a serene glow, expect clear skies offering a vista unmarred by fog or haze. A gentle northward breeze whispers of spring, bringing forth a mild warmth that caresses the skin. The temperatures hover luxuriously close to 67 degrees, inviting locals to shed layers and rejoice in the freedom of a cloudless day. The air is crisp and refreshing, with hints of the bay’s saltiness lingering, making it the perfect opportunity to wander through neighborhoods or pour over a book at a favorite café terrace.

As twilight approaches, the skies will maintain their clarity, cooling slightly to around 50 degrees. Tonight, the city's landscape will bask under a starlit canopy, urging an evening stroll along the waterfront or a cozy gathering with friends beside a fire pit. A light jacket or a cozy sweater will serve well against the evening chill, ensuring comfort without sacrificing style or ease. Embrace this splendid day—whether exploring bustling markets or savoring quiet moments in the park, it holds the promise of joy in its gentle embrace.
